programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."</script><metacontent="

The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite","dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Tim Navy CIS-a istražuje ubojitu eksploziju automobila u Washingtonu koja je povezana s NCIS-ovim specijalnim agentom Nicholasom "Nickom" Torresom (Wilmer Valderrama), a koji je nestao prije šest... Tim Navy CIS-a istražuje ubojitu eksploziju automobila u Washingtonu koja je povezana s NCIS-ovim specijalnim agentom Nicholasom "Nickom" Torresom (Wilmer Valderrama), a koji je nestao prije šest mjeseci dok je bio na tajnom zadatku u Argentini. Također, Gibbs moli NCIS-ovu specijalnu agenticu Alexandru "Alex" Quinn (Jennifer Esposito) da potajice prati njegovu ekipu nakon što je odbio osam agenata koje je ona obučavala i preporučila ih za otvoreno radno mjesto.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Tijekom istrage smrtnog slučaja za vrijeme godišnjice diplome u Quanticu, Navy CIS otkriva bombašku zavjeru i mrežu lopova koja već dugo djeluje. Uz to, Torres i Quinn privikavaju se na život u... Tijekom istrage smrtnog slučaja za vrijeme godišnjice diplome u Quanticu, Navy CIS otkriva bombašku zavjeru i mrežu lopova koja već dugo djeluje. Uz to, Torres i Quinn privikavaju se na život u Gibbsovoj ekipi što uključuje i novi raspored sjedenja u prostoriji.

programme.title: Metoroporisu
Metropolis
programme.desc:
Metoroporisu: Directed by Rintaro. With Yuka Imoto, Kei Kobayashi, Kôki Okada, Tarô Ishida. Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0293416/","name":"Metoroporisu","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWRkOGM0N2UtMTIyZi00MjA4LTg0NjQtN2RkYTQwMGJlNzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDYzNTI2ODc@._V1_.jpg","description":"Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0293416/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tweekums"},"dateCreated":"2009-10-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great retro sci-fi","reviewBody":"I knew little about this film but when I saw that it was going to be on television I decided to watch it; there is so little non-Ghibli anime on TV one has to take what one can get. When it started I knew this was going to be different; most of the characters didn't look like anime characters, they looked more like characters from western cartoons of the 1930s. This fitted in with the feel of the whole film which was a 1920s/1930s view of the future reminiscent of Fritz Lang's film of the same name.

Set in the city state of Metropolis where the robot underclass must stay in their designated areas and a scientist is building a robot that looks like a girl but is destined to run a new skyscraper known as the Ziggurat. Into this city comes a Japanese private detective and his nephew Kenichi who are seeking to arrest the scientist for organ trafficking. The state's de facto leader Duke Red's adopted son Rock is determined to destroy the robot thinking his father is replacing him. Rock starts a fire in the lab. During this the robot is activated and escapes with Kenichi although neither know that she isn't human. Rock continues to hunt them as the flee through the various layers of the city to a climax in the mysterious Ziggurat.

I loved the retro feel to the animation along with a sound track that also felt like it was from that time. The use of the song "I Can't Stop Loving You" during the climactic scene was inspired. Even if you don't normally like animation this is worth watching as it is a good story which is well told.

These comments are based on watching the film in Japanese with English subtitles.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":20822,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Animation","Action","Adventure"],"datePublished":"2001-05-26","keywords":"robot,synthetic human,city,future,based on comic book","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Metropolis","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3878271001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE4NDAxYjEtNWRkMi00Y2ZhLTk5ZWQtMmFkODI5NmFlYjI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWE4NDAxYjEtNWRkMi00Y2ZhLTk5ZWQtMmFkODI5NmFlYjI2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Metropolis"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0299192/","name":"Toshio Furukawa"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0918334/","name":"Scott Weinger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1131157/","name":"Yuka Imoto"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0727336/","name":"Rintaro"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080697/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0064941/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0195909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0856804/","name":"Osamu Tezuka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0960028/","name":"Katsuhiro Ôtomo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0359584/","name":"Marc Handler"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Testna vožnja
programme.desc: Vodimo vas u potragu za starim i novim automobilima i ljudima koji ih renoviraju. Auti koje ćemo vam predstaviti bit će testirani od strane vozača Formule 1, Mike Salona. Vodimo vas u potragu za starim i novim automobilima i ljudima koji ih renoviraju. Auti koje ćemo vam predstaviti bit će testirani od strane vozača Formule 1, Mike Salona. U svakoj epizodi Salon će nam reći nešto više o obnovljenim modelima.

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Burden of Truth
Teret istine
programme.desc:
Burden of Truth: Created by Brad Simpson. With Kristin Kreuk, Peter Mooney, Meegwun Fairbrother, Anwen O'Driscoll. Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6987476/","name":"Burden of Truth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNiNTEyZmYtODIzMy00NmEzLTk4MmYtYTg4ZTc0MzJiOTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYzNDE4ODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6987476/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kristomluver"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow and Steady Wins the Race","reviewBody":"Okay, I am a HUGE KK fan. I have watched all her stuff and that is why I had to check out Burden Of Truth. When I read the description and heard the creators comparing it to Erin Brockovich, I was super pumped to see this because I loved that movie. 

Season 1 is not a high octane thrill ride. It's more of a stroll down the parkway with some mysteries along the way. It takes it's time, BUT, give the material, I think it was quite appropriate in doing so. 

There are some odd story lines that weren't needed or weren't properly inserted into the show, but it still delivered entertainment wise. 

As the lead, Kristin holds her own, and Peter Mooney is a fantastic co-star! The two play wonderfully off each other. Supporting cast rounds out the body of the show quite nicely. 

Would I recommend Burden? ....I sure would! Some writing issues, but overall, the story was interesting, acting was on point and the cinematography was absolutely wonderful!

I am very excited for Season 2!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3615,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-10","keywords":"legal drama,attorney,court case,legal system,female protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0471036/","name":"Kristin Kreuk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312105/","name":"Peter Mooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2868495/","name":"Meegwun Fairbrother"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121071/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466443/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800920/","name":"Brad Simpson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":""Off the Field" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1975630617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"When it's suspected that her big-pharma client's vaccine has caused a mysterious illness affecting a handful of teenaged girls, high-powered attorney Joanna Hanley (Kristin Kreuk) returns to her hometown of Millwood to quickly and quietly settle the case."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6987476, Title: Burden of Truth, --- Description: Burden of Truth: Created by Brad Simpson. With Kristin Kreuk, Peter Mooney, Meegwun Fairbrother, Anwen O'Driscoll. Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6987476/","name":"Burden of Truth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNiNTEyZmYtODIzMy00NmEzLTk4MmYtYTg4ZTc0MzJiOTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYzNDE4ODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6987476/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kristomluver","dateCreated":"2018-07-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow and Steady Wins the Race","reviewBody":"Okay, I am a HUGE KK fan. I have watched all her stuff and that is why I had to check out Burden Of Truth. When I read the description and heard the creators comparing it to Erin Brockovich, I was super pumped to see this because I loved that movie. 

Season 1 is not a high octane thrill ride. It's more of a stroll down the parkway with some mysteries along the way. It takes it's time, BUT, give the material, I think it was quite appropriate in doing so. 

There are some odd story lines that weren't needed or weren't properly inserted into the show, but it still delivered entertainment wise. 

As the lead, Kristin holds her own, and Peter Mooney is a fantastic co-star! The two play wonderfully off each other. Supporting cast rounds out the body of the show quite nicely. 

Would I recommend Burden? ....I sure would! Some writing issues, but overall, the story was interesting, acting was on point and the cinematography was absolutely wonderful!

I am very excited for Season 2!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3615,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-10","keywords":"legal drama,attorney,court case,legal system,female protagonist","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0471036/","name":"Kristin Kreuk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312105/","name":"Peter Mooney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2868495/","name":"Meegwun Fairbrother"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121071/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466443/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800920/","name":"Brad Simpson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":""Off the Field" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1975630617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"When it's suspected that her big-pharma client's vaccine has caused a mysterious illness affecting a handful of teenaged girls, high-powered attorney Joanna Hanley (Kristin Kreuk) returns to her hometown of Millwood to quickly and quietly settle the case."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6987476/","name":"Burden of Truth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNiNTEyZmYtODIzMy00NmEzLTk4MmYtYTg4ZTc0MzJiOTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYzNDE4ODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6987476/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kristomluver"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow and Steady Wins the Race","reviewBody":"Okay, I am a HUGE KK fan. I have watched all her stuff and that is why I had to check out Burden Of Truth. When I read the description and heard the creators comparing it to Erin Brockovich, I was super pumped to see this because I loved that movie. 

Season 1 is not a high octane thrill ride. It's more of a stroll down the parkway with some mysteries along the way. It takes it's time, BUT, give the material, I think it was quite appropriate in doing so. 

There are some odd story lines that weren't needed or weren't properly inserted into the show, but it still delivered entertainment wise. 

As the lead, Kristin holds her own, and Peter Mooney is a fantastic co-star! The two play wonderfully off each other. Supporting cast rounds out the body of the show quite nicely. 

Would I recommend Burden? ....I sure would! Some writing issues, but overall, the story was interesting, acting was on point and the cinematography was absolutely wonderful!

I am very excited for Season 2!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3615,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-10","keywords":"legal drama,attorney,court case,legal system,female protagonist","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0471036/","name":"Kristin Kreuk"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312105/","name":"Peter Mooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2868495/","name":"Meegwun Fairbrother"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121071/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466443/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800920/","name":"Brad Simpson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":""Off the Field" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1975630617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"When it's suspected that her big-pharma client's vaccine has caused a mysterious illness affecting a handful of teenaged girls, high-powered attorney Joanna Hanley (Kristin Kreuk) returns to her hometown of Millwood to quickly and quietly settle the case."}}</script><metacontent="

When I read the description and heard the creators comparing it to Erin Brockovich, I was super pumped to see this because I loved that movie. 

Season 1 is not a high octane thrill ride. It's more of a stroll down the parkway with some mysteries along the way. It takes it's time, BUT, give the material, I think it was quite appropriate in doing so.

I have watched all her stuff and that is why I had to check out Burden Of Truth. When I read the description and heard the creators comparing it to Erin Brockovich, I was super pumped to see this because I loved that movie. 

Season 1 is not a high octane thrill ride. It's more of a stroll down the parkway with some mysteries along the way. It takes it's time, BUT, give the material, I think it was quite appropriate in doing so. 

There are some odd story lines that weren't needed or weren't properly inserted into the show, but it still delivered entertainment wise. 

As the lead, Kristin holds her own, and Peter Mooney is a fantastic co-star! The two play wonderfully off each other. Supporting cast rounds out the body of the show quite nicely. 

Would I recommend Burden? ....I sure would! Some writing issues, but overall, the story was interesting, acting was on point and the cinematography was absolutely wonderful!

IMDb data; ttnr: 6987476, Title: Burden of Truth, --- Description: Burden of Truth: Created by Brad Simpson. With Kristin Kreuk, Peter Mooney, Meegwun Fairbrother, Anwen O'Driscoll. Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6987476/","name":"Burden of Truth","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWNiNTEyZmYtODIzMy00NmEzLTk4MmYtYTg4ZTc0MzJiOTRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjYzNDE4ODA@._V1_.jpg","description":"Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6987476/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"kristomluver","dateCreated":"2018-07-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slow and Steady Wins the Race","reviewBody":"Okay, I am a HUGE KK fan. I have watched all her stuff and that is why I had to check out Burden Of Truth. When I read the description and heard the creators comparing it to Erin Brockovich, I was super pumped to see this because I loved that movie. 

Season 1 is not a high octane thrill ride. It's more of a stroll down the parkway with some mysteries along the way. It takes it's time, BUT, give the material, I think it was quite appropriate in doing so. 

There are some odd story lines that weren't needed or weren't properly inserted into the show, but it still delivered entertainment wise. 

As the lead, Kristin holds her own, and Peter Mooney is a fantastic co-star! The two play wonderfully off each other. Supporting cast rounds out the body of the show quite nicely. 

Would I recommend Burden? ....I sure would! Some writing issues, but overall, the story was interesting, acting was on point and the cinematography was absolutely wonderful!

I am very excited for Season 2!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3615,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-01-10","keywords":"legal drama,attorney,court case,legal system,female protagonist","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0471036/","name":"Kristin Kreuk","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1312105/","name":"Peter Mooney","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2868495/","name":"Meegwun Fairbrother"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121071/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0466443/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051618/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800920/","name":"Brad Simpson"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":""Off the Field" Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1975630617","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzc5NGViZWMtMzE0MS00MTI1LTg4YzAtNjdmYzcxMzFjYzE2XkEyXkFqcGdeQWpnYW1i._V1_.jpg","description":"When it's suspected that her big-pharma client's vaccine has caused a mysterious illness affecting a handful of teenaged girls, high-powered attorney Joanna Hanley (Kristin Kreuk) returns to her hometown of Millwood to quickly and quietly settle the case."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: SEAL Team
Mornarički specijalci
programme.desc: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."}}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 6473344, Title: SEAL Team, --- Description: SEAL Team: Created by Benjamin Cavell. With David Boreanaz, Max Thieriot, Neil Brown Jr., A.J. Buckley. The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt6473344/","name":"SEAL Team","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQxMWI3ZmYtYjQzMC00M2MyLTliN2YtMzgyZTQ2OThhZWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The lives of the elite Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous, high-stakes missions the United States of America can ask.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6473344/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"melsmelanosite","dateCreated":"2019-04-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Best Military Show Ever","reviewBody":"I am a former Special Forces detachment CDR, and I am just thrilled to see this show. In fact, I don't even like watching TV because it is so superficial sometimes. But this is a must see for everyone at all ages. The details remind me of so many things, down to the cages that look a bit bigger than ours for storing gear and stuff, and the absolutely normal looking CIA gal which is so true to reality. And so much smarter than everyone else ! Even the fast chats of some of the lines that a few reviewers found too fast to understand, is actually true to life. A lot of military people are fast talkers. They think they sound smart if they can say things real fast. That is the culture. But as true as the writing is and as close as the settings and actions are to reality, the feel of the show is the real gem. As an audience we feel what they feel, especially losing people from our lives who gave up on us. This includes the almost automatic drive to jump up and get to duty that is so common in those who act from dedication to this country and saving lives. One of the reviewers said it is good mindless fun. Its okay to not see further than that. It is just fun for some. Not everyone comes to dinner for the same thing. Not everyone wants to take the oath and do the dance, and run the North Island obstacle course over and over until it works. Not everyone wants to feel what it means to really care about putting away bad people to protect good people. But for those who want to know more, this shows what it is like to be a quiet patriot. It shows love of country and family and brotherhood without forcing watchers to put sand in their mouths and wave American flags. And it really does touch on things going on today in each of those countries. It is not all Hollywood. I did the jumps from the C17s. It is cold up there. But some people do jump a little exposed at times. Not everyone covers everything exposed perfectly on every jump. I thank you for reminding me who I am. What a gift you give to anyone who will just watch ! I think when this show stops its run which I hope is a long time from now, each of you involved will remember this as one of the most important projects of your lives. And each of the actors is so good that none of it looks like acting. I salute you all for an incredible job well done. I don't think any other military show can ever come close to this one.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":18794,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2017-09-27","keywords":"u.s. military,military,acronym in title,military uniform,nco","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004770/","name":"David Boreanaz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1302735/","name":"Max Thieriot","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0112932/","name":"Neil Brown Jr."],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0666604/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0665583/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0280908/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859706/","name":"Benjamin Cavell"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"First Look","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3313809689","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzNhOTQzM2YtZjc1ZC00ODExLTgzODAtNmQyNDI1MjhiMjg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follow the lives of the most elite unit of Navy SEALs as they train, plan and execute the most dangerous missions our country can ask of them."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Svaki član NCIS-a mora preuzeti odgovornost za posljedice svojih postupaka, počevši od Pridea. Loretta se uključuje u predizbornu kampanju. Kriminalistička serija pod nazivom Navy CSI New Orleans prikazuje tim specijalnih agenata koji istražuju slučajeve vezane uz vojno osoblje New Orleansa. Vođa tima agenata jest pravedni i hrabri Dwayne koji strastveno riješava svaki zadatak koji mu je dodijeljen.

programme.desc: Ultraviolet: Created by Wendy West. With Viet Anh Do, Marta Nieradkiewicz, Bartlomiej Topa, Magdalena Czerwinska. An online community of amateur sleuths use technology to solve crimes -- and make quirky friends -- in their quest for justice." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7514746/","name":"Ultraviolet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjBhOGQyYmMtZTNhOS00MGRlLTljNTAtNDQ0ZGI5N2RjMWMzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An online community of amateur sleuths use technology to solve crimes -- and make quirky friends -- in their quest for justice.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7514746/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sdskate-66437"},"dateCreated":"2018-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great addition to crime drama series!!!","reviewBody":"I have to admit, I enjoy foreign crime series much better than American crime series. In my experience, in other countries the main characters are more developed, made to be experienced as more human and end up more likable than American crime drama series main characters. Ultraviolet is the first Polish tv series I have watched and, not only does it not disappoint, it has a refreshing POV on crime solving by using the amateur Internet sleuths. I LOVED IT!!! programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: I dok se Bradforda žurno vozi u bolnicu, treći terorist dočekuje policiju u zasjedi. Nolan i Bredford, koji je imao samo alergijsku reakciju na primljene lijekove, obračunaju se s teroristom. Dva... I dok se Bradforda žurno vozi u bolnicu, treći terorist dočekuje policiju u zasjedi. Nolan i Bredford, koji je imao samo alergijsku reakciju na primljene lijekove, obračunaju se s teroristom. Dva tjedna kasnije, Nolan je u svom novom domu, dok novaci primaju rezultate položenih ispita. Svi su prošli, no West je sumnjičav prema rezutatima. Nakon što su Nolan i Grey svjedočili pljački u trgovini policijske uniforme tim doznaje za plan koji uključuje lažno uniformirane policajce. Kasnije pronalaze jednog od pljačkaša mrtvog nakon što su ga partneri ubili i zapalili njegovo tijelo.

credits.actor: Nathan Fillion, Alyssa Diaz, Richard T. Jones, Titus Makin Jr., Melissa O'Neil, Eric Winter, Harold Perrineau, Taylor Nichols

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nolan nastoji kontrolirati odnosom s Russom dok gradi odnos s Grace istražujući slučaj koji uključuje agenta domovinske sigurnosti. West je dodijeljen policajcu Smittyju na jedan dan. Smitty je jako... Nolan nastoji kontrolirati odnosom s Russom dok gradi odnos s Grace istražujući slučaj koji uključuje agenta domovinske sigurnosti. West je dodijeljen policajcu Smittyju na jedan dan. Smitty je jako opušten što Westa silno živicira. Kasnije, zločinac kojeg West hvata baca pištolj u obližnje dvorište. Dječak, vjerujući da je pištolj igračka, izima ga i slučajno ubija svoju majku.

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nolan se upoznaje s novom časnicom za obuku, Nylom Harper, bivšom tajnom detektivkom te je zatečen njezinom ekstremnom policijskom taktikom, osobito nadziranjem lakših prekršaja. U ophodnji ugeldaju... Nolan se upoznaje s novom časnicom za obuku, Nylom Harper, bivšom tajnom detektivkom te je zatečen njezinom ekstremnom policijskom taktikom, osobito nadziranjem lakših prekršaja. U ophodnji ugeldaju na Rossa Teagana, diler droge kojeg poznaje Harper. Nolan i Harper postavljau zamku Teaganu, no No Nolan primjećuje da drugi osumnjičeni, Osito, napušta mjesto događanja. Zajedno s Bradfordom i Chenom, Nolan i Harper upadaju na novu lokaciju gdje se nalazi Osito lokaciju te ga uhićuju.

credits.actor: Magdalena Boczarska, Wojciech Cyplik, Dorota Kolak, Joanna Kulig, Radoslaw Kulling, Radoslaw Pazura, Cezary Rybinski, Zdzislaw Wardejn

In my experience, in other countries the main characters are more developed, made to be experienced as more human and end up more likable than American crime drama series main characters. Ultraviolet is the first Polish tv series I have watched and, not only does it not disappoint, it has a refreshing POV on crime solving by using the amateur Internet sleuths. I LOVED IT!!! I sure hope Netflix offers us the 2nd season, and more!!!!!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1479,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Crime"],"datePublished":"2017-10-25","keywords":"technology","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9426329/","name":"Viet Anh Do","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2203849/","name":"Marta Nieradkiewicz","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0867603/","name":"Bartlomiej Topa"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0668353/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0506795/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922388/","name":"Wendy West"]</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Serija pod nazivom "Ultraviolet" prati život tridesetogodišnje Ole Serafin koja napušta grad u kojem živi u supruga kako bi se vratila u rodni grad gdje je svjedočila sumnjivom događaju... Kriminalistička, televizijska serija pod nazivom "Ultraviolet" donosi priču o tridesetogodišnjoj ženi Oli Serafin koja se iz Londona treba vratiti u svoj rodni grad Łódź. Jedne večeri, svjedoči jednom sumnjivom događaju koji izgleda kao pokušaj samoubojstva. Pokušava pronaći pomoć preko interneta prilikom čega nailazi na skupinu detektiva amatera koji se bave slučajevima koje policija ne rješava.

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nolan se upoznaje s novom časnicom za obuku, Nylom Harper, bivšom tajnom detektivkom te je zatečen njezinom ekstremnom policijskom taktikom, osobito nadziranjem lakših prekršaja. U ophodnji ugeldaju... Nolan se upoznaje s novom časnicom za obuku, Nylom Harper, bivšom tajnom detektivkom te je zatečen njezinom ekstremnom policijskom taktikom, osobito nadziranjem lakših prekršaja. U ophodnji ugeldaju na Rossa Teagana, diler droge kojeg poznaje Harper. Nolan i Harper postavljau zamku Teaganu, no No Nolan primjećuje da drugi osumnjičeni, Osito, napušta mjesto događanja. Zajedno s Bradfordom i Chenom, Nolan i Harper upadaju na novu lokaciju gdje se nalazi Osito lokaciju te ga uhićuju.

programme.title: Novak
programme.desc: Nakon što su joj se roditelji posvadili Chen mora podnositi majku u svom stanu, a Nolan sazna da se njegov sin Henry zaručio. Novaci dobivaju svoje prve doušnike: Nolanov je diler droge, koji prvo... Nakon što su joj se roditelji posvadili Chen mora podnositi majku u svom stanu, a Nolan sazna da se njegov sin Henry zaručio. Novaci dobivaju svoje prve doušnike: Nolanov je diler droge, koji prvo pokušava pobjeći od njega, a zatim se predozira. Armstrong pomaže Nolanu i daje mu listu kandidata za doušnike te ujedno provjerava prošlost Henryjeve zaručnice Abigail. Nolan nije siguran želi li znati što je Armstrong doznao. Nolan i Harper prilaze jednom krivotvoritelju želeći da im bude doušnik.

programme.title: We're the Millers
Obitelj Peeples
programme.desc:
We're the Millers: Directed by Rawson Marshall Thurber. With Jennifer Aniston, Jason Sudeikis, Emma Roberts, Will Poulter. A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1723121/","name":"We're the Millers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA5Njc0NDUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjYzNzU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1723121/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sanjna-polamarasetty-869-692642"},"dateCreated":"2014-02-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"An actually funny comedy","reviewBody":"'We're the Millers' follows a drug dealer, a stripper, a runaway and a geek, who come together pretending to be a traditional, all American suburban family to smuggle a whole heap of drugs from Mexico into the US. Fortunately for us, Jennifer Aniston plays a stripper. With all the actors playing surprisingly likable characters, who's opposing chemistry works impeccably when put together. 

I usually find that most of the time, films that parade around claiming to be comedies, usually with one famous face to show, are often just not funny. But 'We're The Millers' was actually a good comedy; probably not in a witty sophisticated way, but it made me laugh. This film also has its emotions, in their own little unconventional ways, considering the leads were not exactly your average person. 

If I had to think of the one thing that I found extremely obnoxious, it would have to be Ed Helms. Everything about his character and his acting, was just annoying, which is probably why the ending made me quite happy. 

Worth watching if you need a no-brainer to spike your mood. And if not for the laughs, I'm sure Jennifer Aniston stripping would do the trick.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":421043,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2013-09-25","keywords":"stripper,girl in panties,wet panties,thong panties,white panties","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi544319001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYwMjM0NzU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDI2ODU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTYwMjM0NzU1MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDI2ODU1OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico. programme.title: Bijeg s planeta Zemlje
programme.desc: Kada lakovjerni astronaut Scorch Supernova odgovori na SOS poziv nepoznatog pošiljatelja i krene u pomoć, upast će u zamku totalno šašavih svemiraca... Svemirska avantura novih crtanih junaka Cala Brunkera autora hitova Ledeno doba i Gru na supertajnom zadatku! Zemljine najveće tajne bit će razotkrivene! Kada lakovjerni astronaut Scorch Supernova odgovori na SOS poziv nepoznatog pošiljatelja i krene u pomoć, upast će u zamku totalno šašavih svemiraca…nađe se u stupici zlih sila na udaljenom "Mračnom planetu" poznatom pod imenom Zemlja otkud ga može spasiti samo njegov brat Gary - u animiranom obiteljskom komično-avanturističkom filmu Bijeg s planeta Zemlje.

programme.desc: Good People: Directed by Henrik Ruben Genz. With Sam Spruell, Michael Fox, Diarmaid Murtagh, Francis Magee. Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1361318/","name":"Good People","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxOTk5ODc0Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDA3MzExMjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Discovering a stash of cash in their dead tenant's apartment, a couple in debt take the money and find themselves the target of a deadly adversary - the thief who stole it.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1361318/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2015-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Does it pay to be good?","reviewBody":"And what is good anyway? Who defines what actions are good? Or if good people are not capable of doing bad things? And would that make them bad people? Don't get it twisted though: This is not a philosophical look at those things. If you even remotely asks those questions, it's not because the movie intended to make you think that much. It's your own perception that goes that extra mile (or two).\n\nThe movie moves along nicely, you can see almost everything coming your way and it's decent, if you're not annoyed by the standard formula this uses. It's nice to see another french actor making the move into "mainstream" Hollywood, even if he's not in it that much. Decent or a time waster, depending on your threshold","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16132,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2015-08-21","keywords":"female rear nudity,shot in z bathroom,american,nosebleed,jogging","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Good People","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2175187481","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1MmRhZDgtNjA4NS00YmJiLWIyMWYtYjQ5MTdkNDI3MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzU1MmRhZDgtNjA4NS00YmJiLWIyMWYtYjQ5MTdkNDI3MTNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Good People"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0290556/","name":"James Franco"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005028/","name":"Kate Hudson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0313227/","name":"Henrik Ruben Genz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002572/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0192833/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0340831/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2951879/","name":"Marcus Sakey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1031176/","name":"Kelly Masterson"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Scream
Vrisak
programme.desc:
Scream: Directed by Wes Craven. With Drew Barrymore, Roger Jackson, Kevin Patrick Walls, David Booth. A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117571/","name":"Scream","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NjU5MTg5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTkyMzQxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117571/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo"},"dateCreated":"2002-04-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scary, funny and clever  the best Scream movie by miles","reviewBody":"Almost a year after someone raped and killed Sidney Prescott's mother in the small town of Woodsboro, someone is killing teenagers. When Sidney herself becomes a target, the link is apparent and her missing father is a suspect. However, as with all good scary movies, everyone is a suspect.

The film that sparked the revival of horror movies (Halloween H2O, I know what you did last summer, Urban Legend etc all followed ..thanks a lot!). This stands out from all those (and it's lackluster sequels) by being really good and clever. The story is nothing more than the standard slasher plot  but it avoids the cliches quite well. In fact it uses the cliches as references and makes plenty of jokey references to other movies and the supposed rules of horror movies  we even have a quick flash of a caretaker dressed in Freddy's jumper and hat!

That doesn't mean it's not scary  it is! From the tragically horrible opening 10 minutes through each gory killing the tension is high and the shocks are real. The plot twists nicely and the ending is much better than most slasher movies (including the absurd endings of 2 and 3). This manages to be fresh, clever and scary  getting by any sticking moments with it's tongue in it's cheek.

The cats are good  Campbell is a believable virgin, scarred by what happened to her mother  before she starts turning into Buffy the vampire slayer in parts 2 and 3. Cox is excellent playing against type and David Arquette is funny as the Deputy Sheriff. Kennedy as Randy is also funny as the movie geek  in fact he remains the highlight of the next 2 films. The cast being filled of up and coming faces (including Ulrich) makes it even more thrilling when the `wrong' people get killed, technically all the cast are `unknowns' who usually make up the body count, so really anyone can potentially get offed.

Overall funny black comedy, scary thrills and gory excitement. A rare treat  a really good teen horror movie"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":300188,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1996-12-20","keywords":"serial killer,slasher,masked killer,female protagonist,telephone call","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scream: Blu-Ray","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1175821337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVhM2VmYzktZTUzOS00NmMzLWFhM2UtMThiY2I1YjRhYTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVhM2VmYzktZTUzOS00NmMzLWFhM2UtMThiY2I1YjRhYTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Scream"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000117/","name":"Neve Campbell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001073/","name":"Courteney Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000274/","name":"David Arquette"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055428/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0932078/","name":"Kevin Williamson"}],"duration":"PT1H51M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0117571, Title: Scream, --- Description: Scream: Directed by Wes Craven. With Drew Barrymore, Roger Jackson, Kevin Patrick Walls, David Booth. A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117571/","name":"Scream","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjA2NjU5MTg5OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTkyMzQxMDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A year after the murder of her mother, a teenage girl is terrorized by a new killer, who targets the girl and her friends by using horror films as part of a deadly game.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117571/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bob the moo","dateCreated":"2002-04-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Scary, funny and clever  the best Scream movie by miles","reviewBody":"Almost a year after someone raped and killed Sidney Prescott's mother in the small town of Woodsboro, someone is killing teenagers. When Sidney herself becomes a target, the link is apparent and her missing father is a suspect. However, as with all good scary movies, everyone is a suspect.

The film that sparked the revival of horror movies (Halloween H2O, I know what you did last summer, Urban Legend etc all followed ..thanks a lot!). This stands out from all those (and it's lackluster sequels) by being really good and clever. The story is nothing more than the standard slasher plot  but it avoids the cliches quite well. In fact it uses the cliches as references and makes plenty of jokey references to other movies and the supposed rules of horror movies  we even have a quick flash of a caretaker dressed in Freddy's jumper and hat!

That doesn't mean it's not scary  it is! From the tragically horrible opening 10 minutes through each gory killing the tension is high and the shocks are real. The plot twists nicely and the ending is much better than most slasher movies (including the absurd endings of 2 and 3). This manages to be fresh, clever and scary  getting by any sticking moments with it's tongue in it's cheek.

The cats are good  Campbell is a believable virgin, scarred by what happened to her mother  before she starts turning into Buffy the vampire slayer in parts 2 and 3. Cox is excellent playing against type and David Arquette is funny as the Deputy Sheriff. Kennedy as Randy is also funny as the movie geek  in fact he remains the highlight of the next 2 films. The cast being filled of up and coming faces (including Ulrich) makes it even more thrilling when the `wrong' people get killed, technically all the cast are `unknowns' who usually make up the body count, so really anyone can potentially get offed.

Overall funny black comedy, scary thrills and gory excitement. A rare treat  a really good teen horror movie","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":300188,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"1996-12-20","keywords":"serial killer,slasher,masked killer,female protagonist,telephone call","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Scream: Blu-Ray","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1175821337","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVhM2VmYzktZTUzOS00NmMzLWFhM2UtMThiY2I1YjRhYTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGVhM2VmYzktZTUzOS00NmMzLWFhM2UtMThiY2I1YjRhYTQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Scream","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000117/","name":"Neve Campbell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001073/","name":"Courteney Cox","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000274/","name":"David Arquette"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000127/","name":"Wes Craven"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0055428/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0932078/","name":"Kevin Williamson"],"duration":"PT1H51M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Alex Cross
Alex Cross
programme.desc: Alex Cross: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Tyler Perry, Edward Burns, Matthew Fox, Jean Reno. A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1712170/","name":"Alex Cross","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1MDE0NjUyMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjQzNjg5Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective is pushed to the brink of his moral and physical limits as he tangles with a ferociously skilled hired killer who specializes in torture and pain.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1712170/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"james1844"},"dateCreated":"2012-10-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Cross to Be Placed on A Grave","reviewBody":"When you make an action crime film please remember to connect all the dots so that we, the audience, can achieve some sense of the story line. The trailer was a slice of many of the best scenes but, unfortunately the real film falls so sadly short of good storyline due to poor dialog and some jerky acting that the viewer struggles to make sense of the various actors.\n\nIf this film had been prescreened (proof read) any average movie-goer would have pointed out just how poorly made it was. I sensed that Tyler Perry gave a over acted performance. I really wanted to like this film when it first came out but, it just was so boring and unimaginative I began to realize that it was due to faulty construction of scenes and character's dialog. This was mostly due to the director.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":33231,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2013-01-02","keywords":"interrupted sex,scene of the crime,character name as title,woman wears a bikini,woman on top sex","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Exclusive Debut","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3041501721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMTM2MjE1NDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDUzMzE5OTc@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxMTM2MjE1NDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDUzMzE5OTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"After Washington DC detective Alex Cross is told that a family member has been murdered, he vows to track down the killer. He soon discovers that she was not his first victim and that things are not what they seem. programme.title: Sammy's avonturen 2
Sammy 2: Morska avantura
programme.desc: Sammy's avonturen 2: Directed by Vincent Kesteloot, Ben Stassen, Mimi Maynard. With Alan Shearman, Thomas Lee, Cinda Adams, Mari Devon. Sammy and Ray, leatherback turtles and friends forever, are enjoying an atoll's water and sand, shepherding new hatchlings Ricky and Ella out to sea. Suddenly, a poacher swoops in and ships them off to be part of a spectacular aquarium show for tourists in Dubai. The kingpin of the place, Big D the seahorse, enlists them in his plans for a great escape. But with their new friends Jimbo the bug-eyed blob fish and Lulu the snippy lobster, Annabel the sweet Octopus, and a whole family of penguins, Sammy and Ray hatch breakout plans of their own. That is when little Ricky and Ella arrive, determined to break in to rescue them. After a series of thrilling adventures and narrow escapes, our heroes head south to meet up with Shelly, Sammy's first and only love." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2288005/","name":"Sammy's avonturen 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzNjc2MDIwOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODMwNzA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Sammy and Ray, leatherback turtles and friends forever, are enjoying an atoll's water and sand, shepherding new hatchlings Ricky and Ella out to sea. Suddenly, a poacher swoops in and ships them off to be part of a spectacular aquari","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2288005/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rsplace"},"dateCreated":"2014-07-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Weirdest soundtrack ever","reviewBody":"Just an "okay" plot that used strange devices in uncomfortable ways to start the story. Very strange choices for the voice-acting. Mish mash of songs that had little or no connection to the scenes you hear them in. Animation was OK but some direct copying of Finding Nemo. I had zero connection to any of the characters and they really weren't memorable. A lot of the scenes I felt uncomfortable letting my 6 year-old watch...they could have been handled/written/directed differently without hurting the weak plot. I would not recommend this unless you had nothing else to watch and you needed a video babysitter for a child 5-7. Just goes to prove you don't need a good script to get produced, just connections.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2206,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Family"],"datePublished":"2012-08-15","keywords":"3 dimensional,underwater scene,escape,penguin,lobster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Turtle's Tale 2: Sammy's Escape From Paradise","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2984356121","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTEzMDRiOWYtYjFjYS00YjUxLWI3YjEtYTljNjc0ZDQ5NjI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTEzMDRiOWYtYjFjYS00YjUxLWI3YjEtYTljNjc0ZDQ5NjI3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"A Turtle's Tale 2: Sammy's Escape From Paradise"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0790474/","name":"Alan Shearman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7368954/","name":"Thomas Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1197574/","name":"Cinda Adams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1062463/","name":"Vincent Kesteloot"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0823721/","name":"Ben Stassen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0562775/","name":"Mimi Maynard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0166216/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0148017/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0661549/","name":"Domonic Paris"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dear Dictator
Dragi diktatore
programme.desc: Dear Dictator: Directed by Lisa Addario, Joe Syracuse. With Michael Caine, Odeya Rush, Katie Holmes, Seth Green. Far too many people are wanting movies with a plot that can be understood and handed to them on a plate...yet these are the films that get poor reviews because they are far too predictable.

This film is special.
